title: Staying alive show (episodes 1, 2 & 3)
creator_credit: Malcolm Orr, David Ferris, Lyndall Horton-Jones and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
brief_description: An entertaining video which reinforces the traffic safety message for children in the early to middle primary years. Using the format of a popular TV game show, contestants are qizzed on the do’s and don’ts of pedestrian and passenger safety.
creator_credit_for_label: Malcolm Orr, David Ferris, Lyndall Horton-Jones and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
